title: Next version of cloudsim should include a feature "upgrade"

content.raw:
Next version of cloudsim should include a feature "upgrade" that would allow keeping the previous constellation and not have to launch a new one.
We need to install several packages and then check that everything is compiling and running on the field computer and it would be very annoying to have to re-do it in order to benefit of the new version of cloudsim.
